lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Economists said that a leaner federal budget could help the credit markets if it lowers the Treasury's financing needs and results in lower interest rates, but investors may not respond until they see evidence that this is taking place.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: First, total revenues showed a slowdown in their yearly growth rate relative to prior months' growth rates, she said, as corporate and individual tax payments net of tax refund payments appear to have been weak in February.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report is likely to mean very little to the moribund credit markets, however, which have been stilled by a stable dollar and perceptions of steady Federal Reserve policy.
